ValidationRule.description: Limit which Statuses the Outbound rep can use
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Profile.Name = 'NSS Outbound Rep' && NOT( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Submitted') ) && NOT( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Pending') ) && NOT( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Cancelled') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have permission to use this value.
